snippet: After three days of intensive talks, military commanders of the main Free Syrian Army units from all over Syria agreed Friday to a unified command structure.
abstract: Military commanders of main Free Syrian Army units from all over Syria agree to unified command structure, product of three days of intensive talks among more than 260 rebel commanders.

byline.original: By NEIL MacFARQUHAR and HWAIDA SAAD

lead_paragraph: After three days of intensive talks, military commanders of the main Free Syrian Army units from all over Syria agreed Friday to a unified command structure.

headline.main: Rebel Groups in Syria Make Framework for Military
headline.print_headline: Rebel Groups In Syria Make Framework For Military
